title: `error=method not found` when running prysm
body:
### Description
Hi. I [installed](https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/install/install-with-script/#downloading-the-prysm-startup-script) prysm, downloaded the [genesis state](https://github.com/eth-clients/merge-testnets/blob/main/ropsten-beacon-chain/genesis.ssz) for ropsten and now trying to run `beacon-chain` node with the following command:
```
USE_PRYSM_VERSION=v2.1.3-rc.2 ./prysm.sh beacon-chain --http-web3provider=http://localhost:8545 --ropsten --genesis-state=./genesis.ssz
```
Prysm version is taken from [here](https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/next/install/install-with-script/#step-4-run-a-beacon-node-using-prysm).

I am using Geth as execution client:
```
geth --ropsten --override.terminaltotaldifficulty 100000000000000000000000 --ws --http --http.api eth,net,web3,personal,admin --http.port 8545 --http.addr "0.0.0.0" --http.vhosts "*" --http.corsdomain '*' --datadir /data/ethereum/
```

`--override.terminaltotaldifficulty` value was taken from [here](https://geth.ethereum.org/docs/interface/merge).

## Error
I see `error=method not found` error message in the log but it doesn't seem to affect the synchronization process, but I believe it should not be there:

```
[2022-06-07 13:09:12]  INFO powchain: terminal difficulty has not been reached yet latestDifficulty=45050210943497720 terminalDifficulty=100000000000000000000000
[2022-06-07 13:09:13]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 62 starting from  0x8f6312b8... 14528/57046 - estimated time remaining 25m32s blocksPerSecond=27.8 peers=20
[2022-06-07 13:09:15]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0x596feee1... 14592/57046 - estimated time remaining 25m18s blocksPerSecond=27.9 peers=20
[2022-06-07 13:09:17]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 61 starting from  0x240e312a... 14656/57046 - estimated time remaining 25m13s blocksPerSecond=28.0 peers=20
[2022-06-07 13:09:19]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 60 starting from  0xfc9fa945... 14720/57046 - estimated time remaining 25m17s blocksPerSecond=27.9 peers=19
[2022-06-07 13:09:22]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 61 starting from  0xe7eb5b00... 14785/57046 - estimated time remaining 25m14s blocksPerSecond=27.9 peers=18
[2022-06-07 13:09:22] ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=method not found
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.init
        beacon-chain/powchain/errors.go:11
runtime.doInit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:6222
runtime.doInit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:6199
runtime.doInit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:6199
runtime.doInit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:6199
runtime.main
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:233
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1571
[2022-06-07 13:09:22]  INFO powchain: terminal difficulty has not been reached yet latestDifficulty=45050404463767376 terminalDifficulty=100000000000000000000000
[2022-06-07 13:09:24]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xf7f48899... 14848/57047 - estimated time remaining 25m15s blocksPerSecond=27.9 peers=19
[2022-06-07 13:09:26]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 64 starting from  0xf2fdd9d0... 14912/57047 - estimated time remaining 25m7s blocksPerSecond=27.9 peers=20
[2022-06-07 13:09:28]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 63 starting from  0xf8932567... 14976/57047 - estimated time remaining 25m5s blocksPerSecond=27.9 peers=20
[2022-06-07 13:09:31]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 61 starting from  0xd5386d16... 15040/57047 - estimated time remaining 25m2s blocksPerSecond=27.9 peers=20
[2022-06-07 13:09:32] ERROR powchain: Could not check configuration values between execution and consensus client error=method not found
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.init
        beacon-chain/powchain/errors.go:11
runtime.doInit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:6222
runtime.doInit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:6199
runtime.doInit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:6199
runtime.doInit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:6199
runtime.main
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:233
runtime.goexit
        GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1571
```

In `Geth` logs I see this error:

```
INFO [06-07|13:48:39.672] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1   txs=0     mgas=0.000    elapsed=6.691ms     mgasps=0.000   number=12,341,910 hash=d6d308..c76901 dirty=70.09MiB
INFO [06-07|13:48:39.673] Unindexed transactions                   blocks=1   txs=4     tail=9,991,911 elapsed="205.503µs"
WARN [06-07|13:48:42.133] Served engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 conn=127.0.0.1:53358 reqid=4807 duration="17.1µs"   err="the method engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 does not exist/is not available"
INFO [06-07|13:48:43.003] Deep froze chain segment                 blocks=5   elapsed=4.128ms     number=12,251,910 hash=b55415..b8c87a
WARN [06-07|13:48:52.133] Served engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 conn=127.0.0.1:53358 reqid=4814 duration="18.901µs" err="the method engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 does not exist/is not available"
WARN [06-07|13:49:02.133] Served engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 conn=127.0.0.1:53358 reqid=4817 duration="20.1µs"   err="the method engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 does not exist/is not available"
WARN [06-07|13:49:12.133] Served engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 conn=127.0.0.1:53358 reqid=4819 duration="21.2µs"   err="the method engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 does not exist/is not available"
WARN [06-07|13:49:22.132] Served engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 conn=127.0.0.1:53358 reqid=4822 duration="19.6µs"   err="the method engine_exchangeTransitionConfigurationV1 does not exist/is not available"
INFO [06-07|13:49:29.397] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1   txs=80    mgas=9.806    elapsed=76.517ms    mgasps=128.157 number=12,341,911 hash=38b383..ddd78e dirty=70.60MiB
```

I believe those errors are connected. Any ideas/help is appreciated.

## Environment

**Operating System:**
```
Ubuntu
```

**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**
```
v2.1.3-rc.2
```
make sure to enable the `engine` namespace in your execution node. e.g on go-ethereum: `--http.api=engine`
@geldmon Yes, enabling `engine` namespace for `geth` fixed both errors. Thank you very much for your help!
